To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private Hikkake _hikkake;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_hikkake = Hikkake(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_hikkake.IsReady)
{
    var current = _hikkake.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.hikkake = self.Hikkake(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.hikkake.IsReady:
    current = self.hikkake.Current.Value
